definition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX n8n_chat_histories_pkey ON public.n8n_chat_histories USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX nde_analysis_pkey ON public.nde_analysis USING btree (video_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX nde_chat_logs_pkey ON public.nde_chat_logs USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_nde_chatbot_chunks_metadata_video_id ON public.nde_chatbot_chunks USING btree (((metadata ->> 'video_id'::text)))
CREATE INDEX idx_nde_chatbot_chunks_video_id_null ON public.nde_chatbot_chunks USING btree (video_id) WHERE (video_id IS NULL)
CREATE INDEX nde_chatbot_chunks_embedding_idx ON public.nde_chatbot_chunks USING ivfflat (embedding vector_cosine_ops) WITH (lists='600')
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX nde_chatbot_chunks_pkey ON public.nde_chatbot_chunks USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_punctuated_content_fts ON public.nde_punctuated_embeddings USING gin (to_tsvector('english'::regconfig, content))
CREATE INDEX idx_punctuated_embedding_hnsw ON public.nde_punctuated_embeddings USING hnsw (embedding vector_cosine_ops)
CREATE INDEX idx_punctuated_embedding_video_id ON public.nde_punctuated_embeddings USING btree (video_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX nde_punctuated_embeddings_pkey ON public.nde_punctuated_embeddings USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_analysis_nde_tags_gin ON public.nde_vids USING gin (analysis_nde_tags)
CREATE INDEX idx_analysis_status ON public.nde_vids USING btree (analysis_status)
CREATE INDEX idx_analysis_status_pending ON public.nde_vids USING btree (analysis_status) WHERE ((analysis_status)::text = 'pending'::text)
CREATE INDEX idx_gin_nde_vids_raw_subtitles ON public.nde_vids USING gin (((raw_timestamped_subtitles -> 'data'::text)))
CREATE INDEX idx_nde_vids_subtitles_text_search ON public.nde_vids USING gin (((raw_timestamped_subtitles)::text) gin_trgm_ops)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX nde_vids_pkey ON public.nde_vids USING btree ("videoId")
CREATE INDEX nde_vids_subtitles_trgm_idx ON public.nde_vids USING gin (subtitles_punctuated gin_trgm_ops)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX nps_feedback_pp_pkey ON public.nps_feedback USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX precog_trials_pkey ON public.precog_trials USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX search_logs_pkey ON public.search_logs USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX uap_embeddings_pkey ON public.uap_embeddings USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX uap_vids_pkey ON public.uap_vids USING btree (video_id)
